title: The only purpose of ADCs
body: Is to give gold to the other team.

replies.body: Tell that to the other half of the boards who'll swear ADCs are unstoppable killing machines that 2 shot tanks and insta gib everyone else.

> Cant cure those people.

sure we can, just make them play a tank... ohh wait, they would build full ad and wonder why they arent tanky... nvm.
